text:
Because of the kind of our industry,
we are a financial company,

so we need to be really fast
on deploying things

to have a reliable service
and be able to scale in zero time.

All of the main benefit you get out of
from AWS was the enterprise support.

We have a daily chat with them.
In case we need something to engage them

We just give them a call and in no time
they will be there to help us introduce

to other people in AWS
and to resolve our issues in no time.

Some of the services
they are using from AWS
is EKS for the Kubernetes service.

For our relation databases
we are using RDS

and for our data warehouse
we are using Redshift.

you need as a service
you can deploy your network infrastructure

in zero time,
your server up and running within minutes.
You have the state of the art

in terms of inter-system
communication message queues.
I believe it is the way ahead.
